description:
Looking for a new Career in the Dental Industry, we have what you are looking for.
The Aurum Group of companies is looking for someone interested in exploring a new career in our dental laboratory in Ottawa. We are seeking those who have great attention to detail, enjoy working with their hands and are interested in developing new skills and working on the manufacturing or administration side of the business.
We are a full-service dental company, with high quality dental facilities across Canada and U.S. We offer a competitive salary package, benefits, paid vacation, pension plan and an exciting career. We make Crown & Bridges, Veneers, Dentures, Ortho and Sleep appliances, and so much more.
Responsibilities:

 Read prescriptions and evaluate for outcome.
 Learning dental anatomy.
 Strong understanding of written and spoken English
 Scanning and designing of dental cases
 Other tasks as requested

Skills and qualifications:

 Attention to detail
 Strong hand-eye coordination
 Excellent work ethic
 Positive and friendly, with a team centered focus
 Excellent understanding of English and French would be an asset

Why you Should work here?

 Work-Life-Balance
 Team environment, which provides opportunity to collaborate with your colleges
 Continuing education; we believe in helping you succeed
 Loyalty in all relationships, both internal and external to the company. Committed to a long-term career path and sustained professional growth within the company
 Opportunity to grow within the company

Job Type: Full-time
Benefits:

 Dental care
 Extended health care
 Paid time off

Schedule:

 Monday to Friday

Work Location: In person
